name: LG UltraFine 27" 4K Monitor
description: Professional 27-inch 4K UHD IPS display with USB-C connectivity and 96W power delivery. Features DCI-P3 98% color accuracy, HDR10, and height-adjustable ergonomic stand.

reviews.review_text: Perfect companion for my MacBook. One cable for everything!
Color accuracy is spot-on for my design work.
Good monitor but speakers are mediocre.
